name: Tokyo Institute of Technology
description: Tokyo Institute of Technology (TOKYO TECH), founded in 1881, develops distinctive students with outstanding qualities of creativity and leadership. TOKYO TECH is making significant contributions to science and technology in many fields of expertise, creating new and powerful synergies. TOKYO TECH, being a research-based university, is dedicated to education and research, and to exploring knowledge in science and technology. Pursuing excellence, TOKYO TECH serves society and the world.
